subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Washington Wizards center Etan Thomas will have open heart surgery today to repair a leak of the aortic valve, a procedure that requires months of recovery time but may not mean the end of his N.B.A. career.Thomas missed the start of training camp Oct. 2 after a routine physical revealed an abnormality in his heart.The 29-year-old Thomas has played only for the Wizards during his six-year career. He started a career-high 32 games last season, averaging 6.1 points and 5.8 rebounds.
